tool_description: Estimates how successful a hypothetical video from a given YouTube channel will be in the first 30 days of its lifecycle. Useful for influencer marketers to plan for successful campaigns and publishers to better rank their content.

api_list.name: estimate
api_list.description: Submit a YouTube `channelName` username value along with the `channelType` as query parameters to get back the estimated video view performance of the submitted channel. This API supports a `channelId` parameter, but the `channelName` is now the default due to YouTube's standardized @username syntax.

required_parameters.name: channelType
required_parameters.description: The type of channel, default is YouTube.

required_parameters.name: channelName
required_parameters.description: Lookup a channel projection by the given username of the channel.
